p: HEK293 rZNS1-His 1E4-C9 cells pretreated or not with rapamycin (as described in 2.1. Cell culture) were incubated in serum-free media for the indicated times. Cell activity was assessed by 3-[4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl]-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide (MTT, Sigma-Aldrich) assay as described previously [ 41].
